group_1.textCenter: My father had been a businessman.
Under his watch, business flourished,@everything seemed to be going so well.

group_1.narration: [textRed:Until you were born]
I heard those words from@my father so many times.

group_1.textCenter: Everything started to go wrong after@I was born.
His business went bankrupt in the blink of an@eye, and my father was buried in debt...
When I was just old enough to understand,@he got sick from the stress and died.
Then my mother passed away, as well...
I didn't have any relatives to turn to, so@I was sent to an orphanage.

group_1.narration: The orphanage was called the Azalea House.

group_1.textCenter: You must be Konoha Shizumi! Welcome to@the Azalea House!

group_1.narration: My heart was frozen into ice@by the time I arrived there.
Everything I saw was faded and gray...
But slowly, gradually, color@began to return to my world.

group_1.textCenter: Look, Konoha! Look at this! This azalea's@about to bloom!
Konoha, what book are you reading today?
Konoha, come over here, hurry!
Konoha!

group_1.narration: Konoha...@Konoha...
The director would always call for@me in her kind, warm voice...
Before long, my heart had opened to her,@and then, gradually, to my friends.
If it hadn't been for the director I might@very well still be in that gray world.
My beloved Director...

group_1.textCenter: That was how I truly became a part of the@Azalea House.
It wasn't long until another girl came to@the orphanage...

group_1.narration: Hazuki Yusa.
The director helped her, as well.@Her wounded heart slowly began to heal.
We were a similar age, so we@spent a lot of time together.
Though I suppose if you@were to ask Hazuki herself...

group_1.textCenter: Mmm... Well, how to put it...
You're definitely the big sis in our group...
But I just felt like you needed help.

group_1.narration: That's probably what she would say...
Even so! I do act as the@leader from time to time.
Although she has helped me a lot@in the past, and actually still does...
Anyway. Since then, she@and I have been inseparable.
Then, a little while after Hazuki@arrived, we met someone else...
Ayame Mikuri.

group_1.textCenter: Come here, Konoha, Hazuki. This is@Ayame Mikuri!
She's still very little, as you can see...@How could theyâ€”
Oh, excuse me... What am I saying?@I'm sorry.
Now, Ayame. Introduce yourself to the@older girls, okay?

group_1.narration: Ayame was found in a back alley of the@shopping district... She'd been left there.
Abandoned by her parents...
Hazuki and I could remember our parents'@faces, but Ayame couldn't at all.
"A big hand pulling on mine."@That's what she said her final,@faint memory of her parents was.
Hazuki and I began to spend a lot more@time with Ayame as we looked after her.
The director...@Hazuki...@Ayame...@Everyone was there...
Plus there was the Azalea House.
That place was my entire world.

group_1.textCenter: Until that day...
